data.title: Your horoscope for Nov 15-21
data.description: Your spot-on horoscope for work, money and relationship from Guru by the Bangkok Post

data.title: Motor Expo 2024 aims to give ailing Thai auto industry a shot in the arm
data.description: 42 car brands from nine countries, 22 motorcycle brands from 7 countries to be showcased

data.title: International artistry on display at world puppet festival in Thailand
data.description: Professional puppet artists from 13 countries are demonstrating their skills in imparting scientific knowledge at the National Science Museum (NSM) in Pathum Thani province, which is hosting the Harmony World Puppet Innovation Festival 2024.

data.title: PM pushes Thailand’s tech potential in private sector meetings
data.description: Paetongtarn meets with top executives of Google, TikTok and Microsoft to discuss government’s emphasis on digital skills

data.title: EC explains new Provincial Administrative Organisations poll date
data.description: The election of chairs and members of Provincial Administrative Organisations (PAOs) will be held on Saturday, Feb 1, instead of Sunday, Feb 2, in a bid to ensure the vote runs smoothly given the legal limitations outlined in the election law, EC commissioner Santhat Siriananpaiboon says.

data.title: Thaksin promises big economic reforms in Udon Thani
data.description: While campaigning for Pheu Thai’s PAO candidate, former PM vows to ease hardships and deliver a revitalised local economy by mid-2025

data.title: State Railway of Thailand defies Department of Lands in Buri Ram dispute
data.description: The State Railway of Thailand (SRT) has appealed the Department of Lands (DoL) decision not to revoke land title documents issued for plots of land in Buri Ram

data.title: IRPC Secures Place in Dow Jones Sustainability Indices for 11th Year
data.description: IRPC has once again proven its dedication to sustainability by securing its position in the prestigious Dow Jones Sustainability Indices (DJSI) for the 11th consecutive year. This recognition highlights the company

data.title: Finance Ministry sees THAI’s rehab exit in Feb, no extra funds needed
data.description: The Thai national carrier is on track to exit its rehabilitation process by February 2025, with plans to re-list on the Stock Exchange by May thanks to strong performance

data.title: Prime Minister Paetongtarn advances key agendas at Apec forum
data.description: Prime Minister  Paetongtarn Shinawatra  will meet Chinese President  Xi Jinping  and other world leaders at the four-day 31st  Apec Economic Leaders

data.title: Leopard spotted in Kaeng Krachan park
data.description: A leopard was spotted wandering around a helipad in Kaeng Krachan National Park in Phetchaburi province, believed to be waiting for its prey.

data.title: Pheu Thai, Thaksin face crucial test in Udon Thani election
data.description: Surge in support for People’s Party at next week’s PAO election could signal trouble for Shinawatra-led government

data.title: Bayer Thai Wins AMCHAM Social  Impact Award for 6th Year
data.description: Bayer Thai Co., Ltd. has received the AMCHAM Corporate Social Impact Award for the year 2024, marking the 6th consecutive year (Gold Level Award) from the American Chamber of Commerce in Thailand (AMCHAM Thailand). The award ceremony took place recently at the Avani Plus Riverside Hotel in Bangkok, reaffirming the company

data.title: ONE Championship announces two title fights for January’s ONE Fight Night 27 card
data.description: ONE Championship has announced two big title fights will headline its ONE Fight Night 27 card on January 11 in Bangkok.

data.title: Phuket shielding sea, dugongs against Loy Krathong trash
data.description: Phuket authorities are mobilising to protect the island’s marine life, including endangered dugongs, from a surge of festival debris during tonight's Loy Krathong celebrations.

data.title: Jarred Brooks begins ‘climbing Everest’ in bid for ONE Championship flyweight title with Reece McLaren matchup
data.description: Jarred Brooks will begin his bid to become a two-division champion in ONE Championship when he takes on Reece McLaren next month at ONE Fight Night 27.

data.title: Headless dugong found floating off Phuket coast
data.description: A headless dugong was found floating near a pier in Phuket on Thursday, making it the third dead dugong reported this month.

data.title: Bangkok Celebrates Italian Cuisine's UNESCO Heritage Candidacy
data.description: In the presence of the Minister of Agriculture, Food Sovereignty and Forestry (MASAF), Mr Francesco Lollobrigida, the Italian Embassy in Bangkok and the Italian Trade Agency jointly hosted a lavish celebration of Italian cuisine

data.title: Frenchman charged for illegally possessing baby macaques
data.description: A Frenchman has been charged with illegally keeping four young macaques after sharing their photos on social media.

data.title: UNICEF launches “Box of Life” appeal to deliver life-saving support for children in crisis
data.description: BANGKOK, 15 November 2024 - UNICEF Thailand today launches an urgent appeal to the public to back its “Box of Life” initiative. This is at the heart of UNICEF's new nationwide campaign, “A Better Tomorrow Today.”

data.title: AOT eyes increasing Suvarnabhumi’s transit flights
data.description: Plan is to have transit flights make up 20% of all flights and turn Thailand’s main international airport into a major aviation hub

data.title: Thai beauty stuns in traditional Siripattara Siwalai costume
data.description: Miss Thailand Suchata ‘Opal’ Chuangsri dons Thai designer Teschvit Krutsang’s creation inspired by a traditional outfit worn at royal events

data.title: Philippines braces for typhoon Man-yi as Usagi weakens
data.description: MANILA — Typhoon Usagi weakened sharply on Friday after bearing down on the Philippines

data.title: heygoody Wins Best Customer-Centric Model Award 2024
data.description: heygoody, a digital insurance brokerage platform powered by Ngern Tid Lor Public Company Limited (TIDLOR), has won the Best Customer-Centric Business Model award from the Global Retail Banking Innovation Awards 2024, hosted by The Digital Banker, a leading news agency specializing in financial and banking technology research. This award highlights the success of the heygoody platform in delivering a truly customer-focused brokerage service, designed to meet the needs of under-banked customers through advanced digital technology. Developed from in-depth customer insights, heygoody addresses the complexities of insurance comparison and privacy concerns often associated with telesales. heygoody offers an online platform where customers can purchase insurance independently, 24/7, aligning with today’s digital lifestyles.

data.title: Shield Insurance Wins Award for Outstanding Omnichannel Integration
data.description: Ngern Tid Lor Public Company Limited, also known as TIDLOR led Shield Insurance, its insurance brokerage to win an award in the  Outstanding Omnichannel Integration  title at the Global Retail Banking Innovation Awards 2024, hosted by The Digital Banker, a leading news agency specializing in financial and banking technology research. This recognition underscores the dedication to innovation and its development of advanced insurance brokerage solutions, enhancing service, sales, and communication channels to deliver exceptional customer experiences.

data.title: Don your Stetson: Saraburi gets ready to host cowboy festival
data.description: The mysterious East gives a nod to the Wild West with a fun cowboy festival featuring delicious street food and concerts

data.title: Ban Chiang artefacts returned to National Museum
data.description: The earthenware pieces had been gifted to the US Embassy in Bangkok in the 1960s by an American soldier

data.title: GULF’s core profit grew 12% YoY to THB 4.71 billion in Q3/24 from energy business and share of profit from INTUCH
data.description: Gulf Energy Development Plc. (GULF) reported the financial results for Q3/24 with a total revenue of THB 31.259 billion, a growth of 11% from Q3/23 and a core profit of THB 4.71 billion, a 12% increase from THB 4.203 billion in the same quarter of the previous year.

data.title: Ransomware continues to pummel organisations in Southeast Asia
data.description: Kaspersky Cybersecurity Solutions for Southeast Asian businesses detected 57,571 ransomware attacks from January to June 2024.

data.title: Thailand expects 4 million more visitors annually after passing same-sex marriage act
data.description: Legislative change is expected to lift Thailand’s GDP by 0.3% by bringing in more revenue from tourism and generating a slew of new jobs across tourism and the broader economy.

data.title: Ransomware continues to pummel organisations in Southeast Asia
data.description: Kaspersky Cybersecurity Solutions for businesses in Southeast Asia (SEA) detected 57,571 ransomware attacks from January to June 2024.

data.title: Thailand is set to attract an estimated 4 million additional visitors a year following the introduction of the same-sex marriage act.
data.description: Legislative change is expected to lift Thailand’s GDP by 0.3% by bringing in more revenue from tourism as well as generating a slew of new jobs across tourism and the broader economy.
